name: points: 1
description: 1/4 day duration (Story Points - measurement of complexity and/or size of a requirement)

name: points: 13
description: 4 to 8 days duration (Story Points - measurement of complexity and/or size of a requirement)

name: points: 2
description: 1/4 to 1/2 day duration (Story Points - measurement of complexity and/or size of a requirement)

name: points: 3
description: 1/2 to 1 day duration (Story Points - measurement of complexity and/or size of a requirement)

name: points: 5
description: 1 to 2 days duration (Story Points - measurement of complexity and/or size of a requirement)

name: points: 8
description: 2 to 4 days duration (Story Points - measurement of complexity and/or size of a requirement)

name: priority: 1 - highest
description: This problem will block progress

name: priority: 2 - high
description: Serious problem that could block progress

name: priority: 3 - medium
description: Has the potential to affect progress

name: priority: 4 - low
description: Minor problem or easily worked around

name: priority: 5 - lowest
description: Trivial problem with little or no impact on progress

name: semver: major
description: Incompatible API changes

name: semver: minor
description: Backwards-compatible functionality

name: semver: patch
description: Backwards-compatible bug fixes

name: severity: 1 - blocker
description: Blocks the interaction with the system, production could not run, everybody dies

name: severity: 2 - critical
description: Causes the system or a component to crash resulting in that part of the system being unusable

name: severity: 3 - major
description: Major loss of function

name: severity: 4 - minor
description: Does not effect the usability and the desired results are easily obtained with a workaround

name: severity: 5 - trivial
description: Minor loss of function, or other problem where easy workaround is present

name: type: bug
description: Inconsistencies or issues which will cause an issue or problem for users or implementors

name: type: epic
description: Large user-story that cannot be delivered without completing sub-user stories

name: type: story
description: Functionality or features expressed as user goals

name: type: task
description: A task that needs to be done
